title: Fernando Pierucci
text:
Fernando Javier Pierucci (born November 28, 1979 in <a href="Arteaga%2C%20Argentina">Arteaga</a>) is a former <a href="Argentina">Argentine</a> professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
He played on the professional level in <a href="Primera%20Divisi%C3%B3n%20Argentina">Primera División Argentina</a> for <a href="Rosario%20Central">Rosario Central</a> and <a href="Club%20Almagro">Club Almagro</a>.
